Shortkeys

Ctrl+O Open Model
Ctrl+S Save Model
Ctrl+Alt+S Save Model As
Ctrl+Q Quit Program
Ctrl+Alt+O Open Options
Ctrl+Alt+M Open Model Properties
Ctrl+Alt+P Open Plot Widget
Ctrl+Alt+U Open Undo Widget
Ctrl+Alt+Y Open System Parameters Widget
Ctrl+Shift+S Simulate Current Model
Ctrl+N Show Component Names
Ctrl+T Show Non-Connected Ports
Ctrl+A Select All
Ctrl+Z Undo
Ctrl+Y Redo
Ctrl+X Cut
Ctrl+C Copy
Ctrl+V Paste
Ctrl+F Flip Horizontal
Ctrl+D Flip Vertical
Ctrl+R Rotate
Ctrl+Space Center Viewport
Ctrl+0 Reset Zoom
Ctrl+Plus Increase Zoom
Ctrl+Minus Decrease Zoom
